I'm probably explaining that badly, but in essence, the last line probably explains it better than I did!

```exposure = -min(worst_possible_profit_on_win, worst_possible_profit_on_lose)
return max(exposure, 0.0)```

text: hey folks, what's the canonical way of attaching something to an order so that I can later print it in the blotter (backtesting) ? i see the Trade notes don't get copied, but I can't find an easy way to put something else.

text: What’s wrong with trade.notes?
